detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1

detailed_analysis.judgment: Quite a few grammar issues here — it makes the message a bit hard to follow. Your ideas connect to the topic, but could use a bit more precision in parts. Your phrasing feels a bit harsh. Maybe soften the edges a little? Emotion runs high here — pulling back slightly could make it more persuasive.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2

detailed_analysis.judgment: Quite a few grammar issues here — it makes the message a bit hard to follow. This section wanders off-topic; try anchoring it closer to the core discussion. Comes off somewhat negative; try framing critiques in a more constructive tone. You sound frustrated; grounding your points in calm reasoning would help. Since it drifts off-topic and feels a bit harsh, it might come across as dismissive.

speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Grammar needs a bit of fine-tuning, though your ideas come through strongly. You sometimes lose sight of the topic; clearer linkage would help.
